lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton is preparing for a tough Sunday slog in sweltering conditions as he bids to claw his way through the field at the Belgian Formula One Grand Prix.

headline.print_headline: Hamilton Ready for Slog From Back of the Field
headline.main: Hamilton Ready for Slog From Back of the Field
